snippet: “Hardcore Activity in Progress” featured 15 acts on overlapping stages Friday night at the Knockdown Center in Queens, including Gunplay, Wolf Eyes and Napalm Death.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews 15-act concert Hardcore Activity in Progress, presenting extreme music in multitude of genres, at Knockdown Center in Maspeth, Queens.
lead_paragraph: “Hardcore Activity in Progress” featured 15 acts on overlapping stages Friday night at the Knockdown Center in Queens, including Gunplay, Wolf Eyes and Napalm Death.

headline.print_headline: For Six Hours at a Festival, the Sound of Extremes Colliding
headline.seo: ‘Hardcore Activity in Progress’ Batters the Knockdown Center
headline.main: For Six Hours at a Festival, the Sound of Extremes Colliding
